courses.subject: GE
courses.customDesc: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, B4, Upper-Division B, C1, Lower-Division C, D1, D2, Upper-Division D, Lower-Division E, F, and GE Elective. Upper-Division B and Upper-Division D should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP) and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: Upper-Division B, C1, Upper-Division C, D1, Upper-Division D, or E.

courses.subject: Free Elective
courses.customDesc:
Any Free Elective course can go here.

Minimum 20 units of free electives. If upper-division GE courses are used to satisfy Major requirements, additional upper-division coursework may be required to satisfy the University's 60-units upper-division requirement.

courses.subject: Minor Course
courses.customDesc:
Any Minor course can go here.

Students may not declare a Spanish minor. Courses in a minor may not be used to satisfy Major requirements or Approved Electives in BA Spanish (no double counting of coursework).

courses.subject: Approved Language/Culture Electives
courses.customDesc: Any Approved Language/Culture Elective (300-400 level) course can go here. Refer to the Catalog.

courses.subject: Free Elective
courses.customDesc:
Any Free Elective (Upper-Division Elective) course can go here.

Minimum 20 units of free electives. If upper-division GE courses are used to satisfy Major requirements, additional upper-division coursework may be required to satisfy the University's 60-units upper-division requirement.

courses.subject: Graduation Writing Requirement
courses.customDesc: Students can attempt to fulfill the requirement after 90 earned units; students should complete the requirement before senior year. Refer to current catalog for prerequisites.

courses.subject: SPAN 400-level course
courses.customDesc: Select one of the following: SPAN402, SPAN410, SPAN416, or SPAN470.

courses.subject: SPAN 300-level course
courses.customDesc: Select three courses from the following: SPAN303, SPAN305, SPAN307, SPAN340, or SPAN390.

courses.subject: Minor Course OR SPAN 300-400 Level Course
courses.customDesc:
Any Minor Course OR SPAN 300-400 level course can go here.

Students may not declare a Spanish minor. Courses in a minor may not be used to satisfy Major requirements or Approved Electives in BA Spanish (no double counting of coursework).

With department approval, any declared academic minor, plus 2-8 units of SPAN 300-400 level courses to reach 32 units. Minor and SPAN coursework used here may not double count with SPAN major core requirements or approved electives.

courses.subject: Free Elective
courses.customDesc:

courses.customDesc: Select one of the following not taken: SPAN402, SPAN410, SPAN416, or SPAN470.
